sentences.en: Breeze, very clean, I shut a last eye, my hands match ten, the moon of my imprecation tonight, don't be piercing I drift on water of sadness.
sentences.cn: 风，很干净，我闭上双眼，我双手合十，我祈求今夜的月亮，不要刺痛我漂泊的忧伤。

sentences.cn: 祈求您, 再多帮助她们一些吧.

sentences.cn: 让我不祈求我的痛苦会停止.
